TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TransferMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 表示通道對要求與回應訊息的傳輸是否使用資料流或緩衝模式。

span.span: Indicates whether a channel uses streamed or buffered modes for the transfer of request and response messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 傳輸支援兩種傳輸訊息的每個方向模式：Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) transports support two modes of transferring messages in each direction: - 緩衝處理的傳輸會將整個訊息保留在記憶體緩衝區中，直到完成傳輸作業為止。Buffered transfers hold the entire message in a memory buffer until the transfer is complete. - 資料流處理的傳輸只緩衝訊息標頭，而公開訊息本文為資料流，每次讀取較小部分的資料。Streamed transfers only buffer the message headers and expose the message body as a stream, from which smaller portions can be read at a time. 傳輸模式設為 Streamed 可讓兩個方向的資料流通訊。Setting the transfer mode to Streamed enables streaming communication in both directions. StreamedRequest 或 StreamedResponse 將傳輸模式可讓資料流只指定方向的通訊。Setting the transfer mode to StreamedRequest or StreamedResponse enables streaming communication only in the indicated direction. 資料流處理的傳輸可以藉由消除大量記憶體緩衝區的需求來改善服務的延展性 (Scalability)。Streamed transfers can improve the scalability of a service by eliminating the need for large memory buffers. 變更傳輸模式是否真能改善延展性，實際需視所傳輸的訊息大小而定。Whether changing the transfer mode actually improves scalability in practice depends on the size of the messages being transferred. 當大型訊息使用資料流而非緩衝傳輸時，延展性的改善應當最為顯著。Improvements in scalability should be most evident when large messages use streamed instead of buffered transfers. 根據預設，HTTP、TCP/IP 和具名管道等傳輸都使用緩衝處理訊息傳輸方式。By default, the HTTP, TCP/IP and named pipe transports use buffered message transfers. 您可在 、、 系統提供之繫結上，使用它們公開的傳輸模式屬性，設定 的值。You can set the values of on the , , system-provided bindings using the transfer mode properties exposed on them. 可在 上設定模式，例如，使用 屬性。The mode can be set on the , for example, by using the property. 它也可在繫結的組態區段中設定。It can also be set in the configuration section for the binding. 對於不公開傳輸模式屬性的繫結，傳輸模式可在傳輸的繫結項目上設定，然後此項目可新增至自訂繫結。For bindings that do not expose the transfer mode property, the transfer mode can be set on the binding element of the transport and this element can then be added to a custom binding. 例如，建立 並在建立自訂繫時，使用 屬性設定傳輸模式。For example, create an and use the property to set the transfer mode when creating a custom binding. 傳輸模式也可在自訂繫結的組態區段中設定。The transfer mode can also be set in the configuration section for the custom binding. 使用緩衝或資料流傳輸的決定是在 HTTP 傳輸端點本機上決定的。The decision to use either buffered or streamed transfers is a local decision of the endpoint for HTTP transports. 對於 HTTP 傳輸，傳輸模式不會透過連線傳播，或是傳播到 Proxy 伺服器或其他媒介。For HTTP transports, the transfer mode does not propagate across a connection, or to proxy servers or other intermediaries. 設定傳輸模式不會反映在服務合約的描述中。Setting the transfer mode is not reflected in the description of the service contract. 為服務產生 Proxy 之後，您可以 (允許但並非必要) 為要搭配資料流傳輸使用的服務編輯組態檔，以設定傳輸模式。After generating a proxy to a service, you can (it is allowed but not required) edit the configuration file for services intended to be used with streamed transfers to set the transfer mode. 如果是 TCP 和具名管道傳輸，會傳播傳輸模式做為原則判斷提示。For TCP and named pipe transports, the transfer mode is propagated as a policy assertion. 使用 Streamed 傳輸模式會導致 WCF 執行階段強制執行其他限制。Using the Streamed transfer mode causes the WCF runtime to enforce some restrictions. - 在資料流處理的傳輸中發生的作業，會與最多一個輸入和/或一個輸出參數 (在程式設計模型層) 簽訂合約。Operations that occur across a streamed transport can have a contract with at most one input and/or one output parameter at the programming model layer. 該參數對應於整個訊息本文而且必定是 、 的子類型或是 介面的實作。That parameter corresponds to the entire body of the message and must be a , be a subtype of , or implement the interface. 擁有作業的傳回值，相當於擁有輸出參數。Having a return value for an operation is equivalent to having an output parameter. - 有些 WCF 功能，例如可靠的傳訊和 SOAP 訊息層級安全性會仰賴緩衝處理的訊息來進行傳輸。Some WCF features such as Reliable Messaging and SOAP message-level security rely on buffering messages for transmissions. 使用這些功能可能減少或消除使用資料流處理模式而獲得的效能優勢。Using these features may reduce or eliminate the performance benefits gained by using streaming. 若要保護資料流處理傳輸的安全，請單純使用傳輸層級安全性，或是使用混合模式安全性，也就是 WS-Security 與傳輸安全性的結合。To secure a streamed transport, use transport level security only or use mixed-mode security, which combines WS-Security claims with transport security. - SOAP 標頭一律會進行緩衝，即使設定傳輸模式為 Streamed。SOAP headers are always buffered, even when the transfer mode is set to Streamed. 訊息的標頭不得超出 MaxBufferSize 傳輸配額的大小。此配額於各種繫結與繫結項目上公開。The headers for a message must not exceed the size of the MaxBufferSize transport quota which is exposed on the various bindings and binding elements. 從緩衝的傳輸模式變更為 「 Streamed 時，也會變更 TCP 和具名的管道傳輸的原生的通道形狀。Changing the transfer mode from Buffered to Streamed also changes the native channel shape of the TCP and named pipe transports. 對於緩衝處理的傳輸來說，原生的通道類型為 。For buffered transfers, the native channel shape is . 對於資料流處理的傳輸來說，原生通道為 和 。For streamed transfers, the native channels are and . 結果就是工作階段服務合約無法搭配傳輸資料流使用。A consequence of this is that sessionful service contracts cannot be used with transport streaming. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範設定Streamed 要透過程式碼的屬性：The following code sample shows setting the property to Streamed through code: **c#****c#** ``` TcpTransportBindingElement transport = new TcpTransportBindingElement(); transport.TransferMode = TransferMode.Streamed; BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement encoder = new BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement(); CustomBinding binding = new CustomBinding(encoder, transport); ``` 下列範例示範Streamed 透過組態屬性：The following sample shows property to Streamed through configuration: ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.TransferMode Buffered = int32(0)

summary.span: 要求訊息和回應訊息皆以緩衝處理。

span.span: The request and response messages are both buffered.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.TransferMode Streamed = int32(1)

summary.span: 要求訊息和回應訊息皆以資料流處理。

span.span: The request and response messages are both streamed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.TransferMode StreamedRequest = int32(2)

summary.span: 資料流處理要求訊息，緩衝處理回應訊息。

span.span: The request message is streamed and the response message is buffered.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.TransferMode StreamedResponse = int32(3)

summary.span: 緩衝處理要求訊息，資料流處理回應訊息。

span.span: The request message is buffered and the response message is streamed.
